choices: Smolder Bravestone - The bulky and brave adventurer
Franklin Finbar - The short Zoologist and weapons courier
Jefferson McDonough - The Pilot with serious allergies to insect bites...
1.content:
You just got back to school after a Christmas holiday, and right away you get sent to detention for mouthing off at your teacher. The principal brings you into his office and tells you that due to past offenses you will be expelled...unless you help clean out the basement.

You shrug at this at first, but decided to clean out the basement instead of an expulsion...

Later that day...

As you continue to clean up the mess, you notice an old console with a game "Jumanji" inside of it...you could of sword that you saw your friends destroy this, but you just shake it off and start to plug it in...after all, the principal was out for an hour or two!

Upon the screen, you are greeted by a title screen along with a bunch animals you would typically see in an African jungle...

After a lame introduction screen which is just a wall of text, you come across a character selection screen.

After a few minutes of pondering, you choose...
1.title: So it begins...

choices: A poacher riding on a motor bike!
A jeep pulling up to you...
11.content:
You decided to select the adventurer, seeming to want to be a default character. Just after you selected the character, you see a bright flash before you see yourself falling into a thick jungle. Despite falling from the sky, you seem to be unharmed...
You look over yourself and see that not only do your muscles bulge out...but you are also bald. You freak out about this, but think this is just part of the game. Before you could do much else, a pop-up screen shows up in front of you...

Player class - adventurer
strength: fighting and climbing trees
weakness: none
number of lives: 3

After that, the screen fades away and you look around in a dense jungle, soon hearing some faint rumbles from deeper in the jungle...
11.title: Smolder Bravestone - The adventurer!

12.content:
You scan the character select options and debate your choices. You immediately go to Smolder Gravestone, the adventurer, but hesitate. You realize that you don't know exactly what kind of game this is. While an adventurer would be the easy choice in a first person shooter game, the dating on the console and cartridge suggested that was unlikely. Then you spotted Professor Shelly Oberon, the curvy genius.

"Curvy huh..." you mutter to yourself. You've always been a fan of the computer generated curves on video game characters, and playing as a genius could have its advantages in more of a strategy driven game. You've made your choice and select the professor.

Suddenly, you're engulfed by a bright light and then thing go black. When you can see again, you are feeling very unlike yourself. You look down at your body and collapse in shock at the sight of a chubby belly and flabby arms.

You pull yourself up and take in your surroundings. You've been transported out of the school's basement into the depths of a thick jungle!

Before you could try to make sense of what had happened to you, a pop up screen flashes before your eyes:

Sheldon Oberon
Player class - Genius
strength: Cartography, Paleontology, and Archeology
weakness: Endurance
number of lives: 3

"What...the....hell?" you ask yourself in a shockingly weak sounding voice.

Suddenly, you hear a rumble from behind you. You turn to see...
12.title: Sheldon Oberon - The middle-aged cartographer

122.content:
You turn and have your hat blown off your head as you stare into the unhinged jaws of an absolutely enormous hippo! Before you can react, the hippo lunges at you. You are engulfed in a moment within her massive maw and are swallowed instantly.

The hippo chuckles happily as she enjoys the sensation of your body traveling down to her massive gut.

In a flash, you go from the inside of a hippo to falling from the sky!

"Ooof!" you moan as you land on your belly. You've gone from scrubbing the basement of your school, to being trapped in the body of a middle aged fat guy stranded in a jungle, to being eaten and swallowed by a huge hippo, and finally fell a hundred feet from the sky!

"How could this day possibly get any worse," you ask yourself as you roll over onto your back with a groan.

Famous last words...

Your eyes go wide as you feel the earth shake beneath you. You look up and see a familiar hippo. She has what appears to be a grin on her face as she stampedes her way toward you on all fours. The hippo steps over your body, giving you an up close view of her underbelly.

"Oh no..." you mutter, before the hippo collapses, crushing and squashing your much smaller form beneath her girth. She shimmies in place happily, flattening what was left of your squashed form.

In a now familiar flash of light, you feel yourself falling again. You try to compose yourself as you tumble through the air, attempting to right yourself and avoid falling on your face. You look down and your heart falls even faster than your body at what you see. You realize that you're falling straight toward the same hippo that had already swallowed and crushed you! What is it about this jungle, this game, and this hippo!

The huge animal glances upward and snorts upon seeing your falling body. She scoots herself up in a display that should be shocking for a creature of her size. But your'e in no mood to be impressed, as her slight motion has your fall directing you straight for the creature's massive ass!

SLUMP!

At the speed of your fall, even your chubby body couldn't provide the resistance necessary to prevent yourself from squeezing between the hippo's massive cheeks upon impact. The creature let out a grunt or a moan and clenched her massive cheeks over your body, squashing you yet again. Her flesh was rough and unyielding, but most importantly, her cheeks were propelled by incredible strength as they chewed up your helpless body.

Another flash of light and you felt your body falling again. You felt nauseous as you fell, wishing for the sweet release of death instead of this repeated circle of torture at the hands of a vicious hippo. She had moved forward and lifted her ass at the ready, just adjacent to where she expected you to land. You didn't anticipate you would last much longer this round than you had the previous three.

As you drew closer to your assumed doom, you feel yourself rapidly changing direction. Your free fall was halted and you were flying parallel to the ground, thankfully away from the powerful hippo. You look around in shock to try to figure out what happened, and you realize that flying was the wrong word. You were swinging.

You look up and lay eyes on the strongest man you had ever seen. He wore an expressionless face that looked as if it were carved out of marble. He had caught you mid-free fall, gripping a vine in one hand and your chubby body in another arm as if you were a sack of potatoes. Finally, he lands at what you assume is a safe distance away from the hippo or any other eminent threats.

"Professor Oberon?" the man asks enthusiastically.

"Uh....um...." you stammer. You shake your head clear and remember that was the name of the character you had selected. "Uh....yeah. I guess. Who are you?"

"Well, here you can call me Smolder Bravestone. And boy, I am glad to see you! Where are the others?" he asks in excitement.

"Uh, others?" you ask.

He looks disappointed. "Well, one isn't four, but it's better than none I suppose," he says dejectedly.

"Look, uh...Smolder...." you start "First, I guess, thank you for saving me from that insane hippo. But can you tell me what the hell is going on here?"

While you were indeed grateful for the save, you had just about lost your patience for this place and needed answers.

Bravestone quickly explains the nature of Jumanji to you, and you quickly realize why your friends attempted to destroy the game. You wish they had succeeded. When he gets to the part about 3 lives, you respond in shock.

"Wait, but that hippo....I died three times already!" you exclaim and check your arm. To your great relief, you still have three bars tattooed on your forearm. Identical to your rescuer.

"Yeah. Well, count yourself lucky that the game starts with a practice level. Sort of like an instructional. To get you used to it. Otherwise....." he doesn't finish his sentence, but whistles long and slow.

You shudder. That was a practice level? What the hell else would be in this forsaken jungle?!

"Well look, now that you're here, at least we can get some use from this. Hopefully it's not just blank to you," Bravestone says handing you a folded up parchment.

You open it and see a detailed map. You realize that for all of his strength, your hero was wandering the jungle lost. He needed you to direct him. To aim the weapon, so to speak.

You examine the map, and instruct Bravestone that you need to head toward...
122.title: A larger than usual animal

1223.content: You two begin to move towards a mysterious temple. You feel like you are in a place you have seen on TV as a cruise destination. You and the other player look over the temple's exterior and noticed that this is a temple that worshiped a massive creature. You read over the strange symbols and noticed that it described this strange deity as...
1223.title: A mysterious temple

choices: Traveling villagers with tasty smelling cargo
A jeep speeding closer to you
13.content:
"Eh, it doesn't make much difference which character I pick," you think as you select Franklin "Mouse" Finbar, the Zoologist. You select your character and are immediately hit by a blinding flash of green light.

The next thing you know, you are falling from the sky, landing in a deep jungle. You stand up with a great deal more strain than you expect. You realize there's a heavy weight on your back. You turn around and realize that you're carrying some kind of backpack.

"Huh?" you ask to no one in particular.

Before you can really take stock of the situation, a pop up screen shows up, describing your character, apparently you:

Player class - Valet
strength: Zoology, Weapons Valet
weakness: Cake, Speed, Strength
number of lives: 3

Cake?! Cake as a weakness? And speed and strength?

You look around you. While you don't see how you'd run into any cake, you don't like your odds of survival in the deep jungle without decent levels of speed or strength. And what on earth was a weapons valet? Must have something to do with your backpack....

Well, at least you'd have something to defend yourself with. You prepare to explore the backpack when you feel the ground shake beneath your feet. You turn around and see...
13.title: Franklin Finbar - The short Zoologist

choices: You swallow hard and go for it
You decide to play it safe and attempt to escape
You try to talk to the woman
131.content:
You look up as you turn around and your jaw drops. Before you, trampling the brush of the jungle beneath her bare feet, is an impossibly large woman. She's barely clothed, with cloths that look like they're stitched together from some kind of animal skins that cover her nipples and most of her crotch, but nothing else. The tall, muscular, curvaceous blonde has her eyes directly on your much smaller body as she stomps your way.

You turn to run, but only get a couple of steps away before you feel yourself wrapped up in a huge fist. The woman doesn't acknowledge you with a single word, but turns on her heels and stomps back in the direction she came in. You squirm to try to get to a point where you can cry for help, but her hand has you held tightly. She's not squeezing with any intention of harming you, but you can't make any progress and certainly can't be heard from your position being held alongside her hip.

Without any ceremony, the giantess drops you on a cushiony surface in a dark room and departs. You look around in confusion. You realize that you're in a very well built hut, huge to you but normal size for the woman who carried you here. In a room of this size, the cushiony surface you're on is, as you recognize, a bed. Upon further investigation, you see another huge woman sitting back in the bed, eying you hungrily. This woman, equally as curvaceous as the first you met, is a brunette and is completely nude. You take a small step back, but recognize that the woman is waiting on you to move toward her. She's not reaching toward you or acting in any kind of a threatening manner. You breathe a sigh of relief.

The woman is not completely still, as she stirs in anticipation. You're alone on a bed with a beautiful, naked woman who is giving you a very inviting look. Normally you would know exactly how to proceed. But your size difference is giving you more than a significant pause.

Suddenly, another pop up flashes in front of your eyes:

A bonus round
Is what you've found
Make her cum
And you have won
A life you must wager to play this game
Beware - No two women are ever the same

You consider the message before you and attempt to process exactly what the meaning of the rhyme was. This is some kind of an optional bonus game. If you win, by making the nude giantess climax, you would win an extra life. But if you lose, you lose one of the three you have. You swallow hard. Additional lives in a jungle that contains giantesses and who knows what else could certainly come in handy. But with your lack of speed and strength, was that a risk you were willing to take?
131.title: An Enormous Amazonian Woman

choices: A chubby and dumb, but friendly male giant!
A poacher riding on a motor bike!
A jeep pulling up to you...
14.content:
You decided to select the adventuress, seeming to want to be a female character. After all, there is nothing wrong with playing as a female in a game, I mean, there's that Tomb Raider game that was once popular back in the day...But Just after you selected the character, you see a bright flash before you see yourself falling into a thick jungle. Despite falling from the sky, you seem to be unharmed...
You look over yourself and see that not only do you sound funny...but for some reason, you have boobs...and you have a firm and curvy ass! You then realized that the game has made you the girl you selected and you panicked for a moment, but then realize that this game might be over soon and you hope your friends don't see this...ever! Before you could do much else, a pop-up screen shows up in front of you...

Player class - adventuress
strength: 'dance fighting' and driving automobiles
weakness: venom
number of lives: 3

After that, the screen fades away and you look around in a dense jungle, soon hearing some faint rumbles from deeper in the jungle...
14.title: Ruby Roundhouse - The sexy adventuress

choices: A poacher riding on a motor bike!
A jeep pulling up to you...
You spot a functional aircraft nearby!
15.content:
You decided to select the pilot, thinking it would be a bit interesting to be a pilot in this game. Not only that, but you think that if another person shows up and plays with you, you can fly them around in the game! Just after you selected the character, you see a bright flash before you see yourself falling into a thick jungle. Despite falling from the sky, you seem to be unharmed...
You look over yourself and notice you aren't that much older than your actual self...not only do you find a big revolver, but you find not one, but two big cans of insect repellents...you start to wonder why you need so much fucking insect repellent...
Before you could do much else, a pop-up screen shows up in front of you...

Player class - pilot
strength: aircraft pilot
weakness: mosquitoes
number of lives: 3

...well, that explains all that insect repellent you have!
After that, the screen fades away and you look around in a dense jungle, soon hearing some faint rumbles from deeper in the jungle...
15.title: Jefferson McDonough - The Pilot that fears insects

info.brief_description: While in school detention, you come across an old game...
info.description:
You are a high school student who comes across an old console with a game inside titled "Jumanji". You could of sworn this thing was destroyed a month ago, but you decided to give it another spin...

Unbeknownst to you, this is a cursed game that draws you into a fictional world where you have to save the world of Jumanji...however, if you lose all of your lives, you either die for real...or be a slave to a person or animal.

[Update: 5/5/2019]: Just an additional rule, in some situations, such as when an animal consumed you, when you could lose a life, you are given a choice on whether to give up your life to continue on with the game or stick around and try to find a way out of your "trap", regardless of how much time passes...

Some of the things you will encounter:

1. Strange encounters with the jungle animals
2. Lewd Villagers at a huge bazaar
3. Giant male and female humans
4. Jungle natives welding magic deep in the jungle

Can you conquer Jumanji or will it take you?

Encouraged:
Vore, shrinking, lewd acts with the animals, enslavement, and stench play

Not allowed:
highly detailed gorey violence, soul vore, and watersports.

Also, will give out points to good additions. The better the addition, the more points you will get!
